attributes.action: Isimeli Baleiwai should stay in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned believe that Isimeli Baleiwai should be allowed to stay in the UK indefinately.

After serving our country admirably for 13 years, being married to a British National with two children also British Nationals it is unethical to ask him to leave.  Breaking up a loving family because of a small incident after a returning from service in Afghanistan is very wrong and his rights to stay need to be protected.
